channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s Triumphal Arch Is An Important Rebellion Against Postmodern Thought
item.description: The greatness of neoclassical art and architecture lies not merely in historical memory but in truth. And that's why modernists hate it.

item.title: Short-seller claims IonQ, the biggest quantum computing company on the stock market, failed to disclose holes in its revenue
item.description: Short-seller Wolfpack Research says IonQ misled investors about cancelled government earmarks; it also points to suspicious insider stock sales.

item.title: From ‘Operation Dirtbag’ to ‘Catch of the Day,’ Trump’s ICE nicknames ripped as ‘disgusting’ and ‘subhuman’

item.title: Republicans, Trump run into Senate roadblock on voter ID bill

item.title: S&P rings up 5th loss in 6 days as tech stocks drag index down, led by AMD’s 17.3% drop
item.description: More than twice as many stocks rose within the S&P 500 than fell, but sinking technology stocks weighed on the index for a second straight day.
